title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: This enchanting potion bottle is a mystical item designed for adventurers and alchemists alike. Its shimmering green glass resonates with the essence of nature, encapsulating both plant life and elemental fire. The flickering flame and delicate leaves inside symbolize the harmonious balance between life and energy, offering a unique blend of restorative power and elemental magic. When used, it can rejuvenate weary allies, enhance spells, or ignite fierce flames in battle. Crafted by skilled herbalists, this bottle is not just a potion; it’s a key to unlocking nature’s hidden potential in any quest. Embrace its power and embark on your adventure!
